text: Hadiza Isma El-Rufai (born June 21, 1960) is a Nigerian writer and wife to the current governor of Kaduna State, Mallam Nasir El-Rufai. == Education == El- Rufai has a Bachelor's degree and Master's degree in architecture. She also has a MBA from Ahmadu Bello University, Zaria. She also has a Masters in Creative Writing from Bath Spa University, England. == References == Category:1960 births Category:living people Category:Nigerian writers Category:People from Kano State
title: Hadiza Isma El-Rufai
